question: Who has been appointed as the Executive Director of the Monetary Policy Department in the Reserve Bank of India?
explanation:
The Principal advisor to the monetary policy department, Janak Raj has been appointed by the Reserve Bank of India, as the Executive Director of the Monetary Policy Department.
Michael Patra who held the post earlier was elevated as the Deputy Governor in charge of Monetary Policy and a part of the six-member monetary policy committee (MPC). Janak Raj, will be the part of the committee as an internal member of the Reserve Bank of India. With the new appointment, RBI has its full strength of 12 Executive Directors.
